name: find-yarn-workspace-root2
description: Algorithm for finding the root of a yarn workspace, extracted from yarnpkg.com
author: Square, Inc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run ncu && yarn run sort-package-json && yarn run test
scripts.prepublishOnly:update: yarn run ncu && yarn run sort-package-json
scripts.prepublishOnly_: yarn run prepublishOnly:check-bin && yarn run test
